support.title: Support & Feedback
support.description: If you find this project helpful, please consider supporting us:

settings.title: AI Optimization Service Configuration
settings.description: Configure AI services to enable prompt optimization and generation features. Supports major domestic and international AI service providers, local deployments, and third-party API aggregation services.
settings.tip: üí° Recommendation: Domestic users can prioritize services like DeepSeek, Kimi, or use aggregation services such as SiliconFlow.
settings.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Some international services may require a network proxy for access.
settings.selectModel: Select a model or enter a custom one
settings.customModelPlaceholder: Enter a custom model name, e.g., gpt-4o-2024-08-06
settings.customModelTip: üí° Tip: Please ensure the model name exactly matches the one supported by your API provider.
settings.instruction1: After configuration, the AI Optimization button will appear when creating or editing prompts.
settings.instruction2: The AI will optimize your content based on prompt engineering best practices.
settings.instruction3: Supports generating new prompts or optimizing existing content.
settings.instruction4: Domestic services: DeepSeek, Kimi, Doubao, etc., do not require a proxy and offer faster speeds.
settings.instruction5: International services: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini, etc., may require a proxy for access.
settings.instruction6: Custom API: Supports optimization using a custom API. Requires configuring the API URL and API Key.
settings.instruction7: Please ensure your API Key has sufficient usage quota.
settings.saveError: Error occurred while saving the configuration.
